info.name: iFacebook 7
info.description: A simple iOS 7 style for Facebook. It's simple :) Note: Check for update 2 days after seeing an new error
info.additionalInfo:
First release - 5 August 2014
  • Rounded avatar.
  • iOS 7 chat UI.
  • iOS 7 notification bar.
  • Edited background images.
6 August 2014
  • Edit the background-image(Fuq you FB -_-)
  • Sorry for the too-quick-update :(
  • Ok, the background-image wont change any more
  • Change some background color, notification button,...
  • Set margin for some element.
7 August 2014
  • Notification count(number) has become rounded, transparent. This look is from Mac OS X Yosemite not iOS 7.
8 August 2014
  • Change the font weight of some button.
Finish iFacebook 7 - 10 August 2014
  • Keep installing...
  • Nothing here...
19 August 2014
  • Edit the badge icon at notification center
  • Edit the chat area
22 August 2014
  • Change opacity of badge icons
24 August 2014
  • Removed border on: timeline, newfeed, cover image, etc...
  • Edit width of content in setting pages
27 August 2014
  • Facebook updated their notification icon, so i must update too...
31 August 2014
  • Change the button style, background colors, etc
  • Install it to feel the changes XD
6 September 2014
  • Fix some button style
  • Change hover color of submenu
21 September 2014
  • Fix some buttons style
24 September 2014
  • Fix the message jewel button
4 October 2014
  • Change the text color of chat panel
16 November 2014
  • Margin fix for chatbox
  • Minor bug fixed
25 December 2014
  • Fix some buttons
  • Fix the search bar
  • Sorry I can't find how to fix the blank notification icon
